title: IIITDM Kurnool Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Research Associate Posts
description: The Indian Institute of Information Technology Design and Manufacturing Kurnool (IIITDM Kurnool) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Research Associate Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Ph.D. in Electrical, Mechanical Engineering can apply for the IIITDM Kurnool Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in offline mod...
